009package Ch16_ColorEdges;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
013import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
014import ij.process.ColorProcessor;
015import ij.process.FloatProcessor;
016import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
017import imagingbook.common.edges.EdgeDetector;
018import imagingbook.common.edges.MultiGradientEdgeDetector;
019import imagingbook.core.FileUtils;
020
021
022/**
023 * This plugin implements a multi-gradient (DiZenzo/Cumani-style) color 
024 * edge detector.
025 * @author WB
026 * @version 2013/05/30
027 */
028public class Color_Edges_DiZenzo implements PlugInFilter {
029        
030        static boolean showEdgeMagnitude = true;
031        static boolean showEdgeOrientation = false;
032        
033        ImagePlus imp = null;
034
035    public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
036        this.imp = imp;
037        return DOES_RGB + NO_CHANGES;
038    }
039
040    public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
041        String title = imp.getTitle();
042        title = FileUtils.stripFileExtension(title);
043        
044        if (!setParameters()) return;
045        
046        ColorProcessor cp = (ColorProcessor) ip;
047        EdgeDetector ced = new MultiGradientEdgeDetector(cp);
048        
049        if (showEdgeMagnitude) {
050                FloatProcessor edgeMagnitude = ced.getEdgeMagnitude();
051                (new ImagePlus("Edge Magnitude (DiZenzo)", edgeMagnitude)).show();
052        }
053                if (showEdgeOrientation) {
054                        FloatProcessor edgeOrientation = ced.getEdgeOrientation();
055                        (new ImagePlus("Edge Orientation (DiZenzo)", edgeOrientation)).show();
056                }
057    }
058    
059    boolean setParameters() {
060                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog("Multi-Gradient Color Edges");
061                gd.addCheckbox("Show edge magnitude", showEdgeMagnitude);
062                gd.addCheckbox("Show edge orientation", showEdgeOrientation);
063                gd.showDialog();
064                if(gd.wasCanceled()) return false;
065                showEdgeMagnitude = gd.getNextBoolean();
066                showEdgeOrientation =  gd.getNextBoolean();
067                return true;
068    }
069      
070}
071
